name: swarm
description: Swarm is a Docker-native clustering system.
postInstallNotes: Swarm is installed in your cluster. Please set DOCKER_HOST environment variable to the public slave ip once it is in running state and use your docker client to interact with swarm.
preInstallNotes: Note that the Docker Swarm DCOS Service is beta and there may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation or other discrepancies.
postUninstallNotes:
The Docker Swarm DCOS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
Note that any docker container that is launched and still running from swarm will be kept running.
